about_the_game: Enter the world of DRIFTHUB: Enjoy driving and simulation. You can shoot and troll your friends, customize your vehicles and build. You can explore as you wish in 7 delightful maps, and you can own numerous new vehicles to come with free updates. Have fun with your friends.
detailed_description: Enter the world of DRIFTHUB: Enjoy driving and simulation. You can shoot and troll your friends, customize your vehicles and build. You can explore as you wish in 7 delightful maps, and you can own numerous new vehicles to come with free updates. Have fun with your friends.
name: DRIFTHUB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enter the world of DRIFTHUB: Enjoy driving and simulation. Have a pleasant time with your friends.
